languages.text: {n}Кассия неопределенно пожимает плечами, поднимая на вас испытующий взгляд двух рубинов.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Cassia shrugs noncommittally, raising her questioning ruby gaze to you.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Cassia se encoge de hombros y te mira inquisitivamente con sus ojos de color rubí.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia shrugs noncommittally, raising her questioning ruby gaze to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia se encoge de hombros y te mira inquisitivamente con sus ojos de color rubí.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}カシアは感心なさそうに肩をすくめ、ルビー色の目で怪訝そうにこちらを見た。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia shrugs noncommittally, raising her questioning ruby gaze to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}カシアは感心なさそうに肩をすくめ、ルビー色の目で怪訝そうにこちらを見た。{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}卡西娅不置可否地耸耸肩，抬起她红宝石般的眼睛，目光中带着怀疑。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia shrugs noncommittally, raising her questioning ruby gaze to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}卡西娅不置可否地耸耸肩，抬起她红宝石般的眼睛，目光中带着怀疑。{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia hausse nonchalamment les épaules et vous lance un regard interrogateur.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia shrugs noncommittally, raising her questioning ruby gaze to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia hausse nonchalamment les épaules et vous lance un regard interrogateur.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia zuckt mit den Schultern und mit ihren rubinfarbenen Augen fragend zu dir auf.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Cassia shrugs noncommittally, raising her questioning ruby gaze to you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia zuckt mit den Schultern und mit ihren rubinfarbenen Augen fragend zu dir auf.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Cassia çekimserce omuz silkiyor, ardından da yakut kırmızısı gözlerini tüm sorgulayıcılığıyla sana çeviriyor.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia çekimserce omuz silkiyor ve lal kırmızısı gözlerindeki sorgulayıcı bakışla sana dönüyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
